statements: SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT name, city, state FROM locations WHERE country='USA';
SELECT location_id, name, address FROM locations WHERE city='New York';
SELECT * FROM locations ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT city, state, country FROM locations WHERE state='California' ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT name, city, state FROM locations ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE state = 'California' AND city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT name, city, state, address FROM locations WHERE state = 'New York' AND country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM locations ORDER BY state DESC, city ASC;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT offer_name, discount FROM offers WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM offers WHERE discount >= 10.00;
SELECT offer_name, discount FROM offers ORDER BY discount DESC, offer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE location_id > 2 ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT offer_id, offer_name, discount, location_name FROM offers JOIN locations ON offers.location_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE location_name LIKE '%Park%' ORDER BY latitude ASC;
SELECT offer_id, offer_name, discount, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM offers JOIN locations ON offers.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE discount > 10;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT offer_id, offer_title, discount FROM Offers ORDER BY discount DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT offer_title, discount FROM Offers WHERE discount > 20;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM Locations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE location_id = 2 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT offer_title, discount FROM Offers WHERE discount > 10 AND location_id = 3;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM Locations WHERE latitude < -40 ORDER BY location_id;
SELECT user_id, username, email, location_name FROM Users JOIN Locations ON Users.location_id = Locations.location_id;
SELECT * FROM Locations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM Locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM UserLocations ul JOIN Users u ON ul.user_id = u.user_id WHERE ul.location_id = 1;
SELECT offer_description, discount FROM Offers WHERE discount > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM Locations WHERE location_name = 'New York' ORDER BY longitude DESC
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' AND username LIKE 'A%'
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM Locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -70 ORDER BY location_name ASC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(location_id) AS total_locations FROM UserLocations GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_locations > 3
SELECT * FROM Offers WHERE discount > 0.2 ORDER BY offer_id
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT offer_name, location_name FROM offers JOIN locations ON offers.location_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT service_name, location_name FROM services JOIN locations ON services.location_id = locations.location_id ORDER BY service_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT offer_name, location_name FROM offers INNER JOIN locations ON offers.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE longitude < 0;
SELECT * FROM services WHERE location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40);
SELECT user_id, location_name, entry_time FROM user_location_history INNER JOIN locations ON user_location_history.location_id = locations.location_id ORDER BY entry_time ASC;
